attributes.action: ensure that people are held accountable for the failure of social services to safeguard the care of Baby P
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am sure you are aware of recent media reports of the recent conviction of Jason Owen and two others  for the killing of a defenceless baby boy in August 2007. Someone needs to be held accountable for this shocking failure of social care! At some point someone said "yes' he can be returned home!!!!!  to die!!!!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
